links.to_node: refuse to take care of the dog unless my sister steps up and takes responsibility.
My older sister may feel pressured or confronted by my refusal to help with the dog
My mother and younger sister may feel additional burden and stress from having to take care of the dog without my help
The dog may continue to suffer from lack of proper care and attention
Tension and conflict within the family may increase due to the unresolved issue of the dog's care
I may feel guilty or conflicted about not helping with the dog despite my concerns for its well-being
